title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin sees that Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant of the sinking Brooklyn Nets understand the "how" of a successful team, but not the "why." And as sports villains, they don't have much lasting power. Colin feels that the Chicago Bulls' DeMar DeRozan is often overlooked because he isn't a three-point guy, but he's getting buckets when it counts. Plus, the Philadelphia 76ers have benefitted from "addition by subtraction" after ridding their home of the Ben Simmons clutter. Finally, Stephen Jackson, longtime NBA veteran and FOX Sports NBA analyst, joins The Herd to discuss some of the evolving storylines coming from the NBA Playoffs. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
